mapper.sql: id as id, platform_recommend_rule_id as platformRecommendRuleId, platform_id as platformId, priority as priority, ou_id as ouId, create_time as createTime, created_id as createdId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, modified_id as modifiedId
mapper.select: select r.id as id, r.platform_recommend_rule_id as platformRecommendRuleId, r.platform_id as platformId, r.priority as priority, r.ou_id as ouId, r.create_time as createTime, r.created_id as createdId, r.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, r.modified_id as modifiedId, p.platform_code as platformCode from t_wh_recommend_platform r left join t_wh_platform p on r.platform_id = p.id where r.platform_recommend_rule_id = #{platformRecommendRuleId} and r.ou_id = #{ouId} and p.lifecycle = 1 and p.is_occupied = 0 order by r.priority asc limit 1
